Literature.Title: A Head-to-Head Comparison of the Antimicrobial Activities of 30 Ultra-Short Antimicrobial Peptides Against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Candida albicans
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Choo XY, Lim ZX, Kong XN, Ng FM, Ang M, Hill J, Chia CS

Literature.Title: Comparative Analysis of the Antimicrobial Activities of Plant Defensin-Like and Ultrashort Peptides against Food-Spoiling Bacteria
Literature.Author: Kraszewska J, Beckett MC, James TC, Bond U

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM),Levilactobacillus brevis L1055 (90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Lapidilactobacillus dextrinicus DSM 20293(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Bacillus cereus NCIMB 1526(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCIMB 950   (90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml)
